title: Season 6 Teamranked Rewards 10 or 11 wins?
body: I dont get it, the text says a minimum of 10 games, now that we have 10 games won, still it says "you have to win one more game for the season rewards" can somone help me out on that?

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct. In this case, it comes down to your **personal wins** with that ranked team, rather than the ranked team's overall wins with or without you.

I hope this clarifies the eligibility for [Ranked Season Rewards](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/228380727) for you. If you have any other questions, please let me know.
Thank you, this was very helpful!
You personally need to have won 10 games on the team to qualify for team ranked rewards.
